summary: Transforms a generic DGL dataset into a standardized node‑prediction dataset by keeping only the first graph, attaching node labels and train/validation/test masks as node attributes, and exposing class count and index tensors. Supports heterogeneous graphs via a target node type and automatically creates and caches split masks according to a user‑specified ratio, re‑processing when the ratio changes.
business_intent: Enable fast and consistent preparation of graph data for semi‑supervised transductive node classification models, reducing preprocessing effort and ensuring reproducible train/validation/test splits.
